title: Coronado National Memorial: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions      By CarFrom Phoenix or Tucson take I-10 east and take exit 302 / Hwy 90 to Sierra Vista/Fort Huachuca. Continue south on Hwy 90 to Sierra Vista. Merge onto Hwy 92 and continue south for about 14 miles to S. Coronado Memorial Drive. Turn south and follow Coronado Memorial Drive (it will turn into E Montezuma Canyon Rd) 5 miles to the Visitor Center.From Willcox/Lordsburg and points east, take I-10 west and take the Sierra Vista/Fort Huachuca exit (exit 302) and head south on Hwy 90. After reaching Sierra Vista, continue south on Hwy 92 about 14 miles to S. Coronado Memorial Drive. Turn south and follow Coronado Memorial Drive (it will turn into E Montezuma Canyon Rd) 5 miles to the Visitor Center.From Bisbee, take Hwy 92 west for approximately 20 miles and turn south onto Coronado Memorial Drive/E Montezuma Canyon Rd. Follow Coronado Memorial Drive/E Montezuma Canyon Rd for 5 miles to the Visitor Center.By PlaneThe closest airport serving southeast Arizona is Tucson International Airport. Tucson is located about 90 miles/145 kilometers (1.5 hours) northwest of Coronado National Memorial. Sky Harbor Airport in Phoenix, Arizona is a larger hub but is located further away, about 100 miles north of Tucson (3 - 3.5 hours from the park).Public TransportationNo public transportation service is available to Coronado National Memorial.
